intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product. It provides a comprehensive guide to the N2K product, which offers detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) data for over 4,700 grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe for the reference years 2006, 2012, and 2018. The manual outlines the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment, and technical support information, enabling users to effectively utilise the high-resolution satellite-derived data for monitoring and assessing habitat conservation status.
